amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the language in the bill wih the text of the "Reverse the Raid on Student Aid Act of 2006".
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-401 to lower student loan interest rates; establish a new Predominantly Black Serving Institution program to boost college participation rates of low-income, black students; establish a new graduate Hispanic Serving Institution program; provide for year- round Pell grants; and repeal the Single Lender rule.

action.text: Amendment (A023) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 220 (Roll no. 80).
